<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<!DOCTYPE mapper PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN" "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd" >
<mapper namespace="com.xyz.caofancpu.springdata.mapper.DemoMapper">

<!-- auto define result set -->
    <resultMap id="resultColumn" type="com.xyz.caofancpu.util.d8ger.view.Demo">
        <result column="id" property="id"/>
        <result column="name" property="name"/>
        <result column="school_no" property="schoolNo"/>
    </resultMap>

<!-- auto generated column -->
    <sql id="all_column">
        id,
        name,
        school_no
    </sql>

<!-- auto generated [add] -->
    <insert id="add">
        INSERT INTO demo
        <trim prefix="(" suffix=")" suffixOverrides=",">
            <if test="id != null"> id, </if>
            <if test="name != null"> name, </if>
            <if test="schoolNo != null"> school_no, </if>
        </trim>
        VALUES
        <trim prefix="(" suffix=")" suffixOverrides=",">
            <if test="id != null"> #{id}, </if>
            <if test="name != null"> #{name}, </if>
            <if test="schoolNo != null"> #{schoolNo}, </if>
        </trim>
    </insert>

<!-- auto generated [batchAdd] -->
    <insert id="batchAdd">
        INSERT INTO demo(
        <include refid="all_column"/>
        ) VALUES
        <foreach collection="list" item="item" index="index" separator=",">
            (
                #{item.id},
                #{item.name},
                #{item.schoolNo}
            )
        </foreach>
    </insert>

<!-- auto generated [update] -->
    <update id="update">
        UPDATE demo
        <set>
            <if test="id != null"> id = #{id}, </if>
            <if test="name != null"> name = #{name}, </if>
            <if test="schoolNo != null"> school_no = #{schoolNo} </if>
        </set>
         WHERE id = #{id}
    </update>

<!-- auto generated [queryList] -->
    <select id="queryList" resultMap="resultColumn">
        SELECT <include refid="all_column"/>
        FROM demo
        <where>
            <if test="id != null"> AND id = #{id} </if>
            <if test="name != null"> AND name = #{name} </if>
            <if test="schoolNo != null"> AND school_no = #{schoolNo} </if>
        </where>
        LIMIT 100
    </select>

<!-- auto generated Code [deleteById]-->
    <delete id="deleteById">
        DELETE FROM demo where id = #{id}
    </delete>
</mapper>
